text: Manfred Bleskin (13 December 1949 – 21 January 2014) was a German journalist and television presenter. Bleskin was born in Tribsees, East Germany. He began working after receiving a doctorate from the Akademie für Gesellschaftswissenschaften. He spoke five languages. Bleskin died on 21 January 2014, aged 64, in Berlin, Germany. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:2014 deaths Category:East German writers Category:German television presenters Category:German journalists Category:Writers from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern
title: Manfred Bleskin
